item.title: CVE-2024-29104|2024-03-19T15:42:08.839Z -- zimma%20ltd. -- ticket%20tailor
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Zimma Ltd. Ticket Tailor allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Ticket Tailor: from n/a through 1.10.
